results.title: Antiwar Activists Who Flee Russia Find Detention, Not Freedom, in the U.S.
results.abstract: Thousands of Russians are crossing the U.S. southern border to claim asylum. Many are ending up in immigration prison. “I left Russia for a place just like Russia,” said one.

results.title: Jewish Allies Call Trump’s Dinner With Antisemites a Breaking Point
results.abstract: Supporters who looked past the former president’s admirers in bigoted corners of the far right, and his own use of antisemitic tropes, now are drawing a line. “He legitimizes Jew hatred and Jew haters,” says one. “And this scares me.”
